n: Green Beans Kids are Sure to Eat
des: "A quick simple idea for kids to eat there greens. Remember to make it fun. White or black pepper can be used in this recipe."
ins: Heat butter, garlic powder, onion powder, and pepper in a saucepan over medium heat until butter is melted, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir green beans into butter mixture and cook until beans are heated through, 5 to 10 minutes.
